## Tender Announcement: Canadian Photovoltaic Market Assessment

### Solicitation Number: NRCan-5000084168

**Introduction**
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking proposals from qualified bidders for the Canadian Photovoltaic (PV) market assessment. The selected bidder will provide an assessment of the Canadian solar PV market for the 2024-27 calendar years.

**Key Details**

* Tender Status: Open
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-12-17T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2025-04-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2026-03-31

**Objectives**
The objective of this assessment is to examine the progress of the Canadian solar PV market as part of NRCan's annual reporting activities to stakeholders.

**Selection Criteria**
Proposals will be evaluated based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The bidder with the highest combined rating will be selected.

**How to Participate**
Bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically, complete with all necessary documentation, to the address listed below.

**Contractor Information**

* Contracting Entity: Natural Resources Canada
* Address: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0E4
* Contact: Anik Samson
* Phone: (613) 408-3462
* Email: [anik.samson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:anik.samson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**: 
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52491/nrcan-5000084168---rfp.pdf

**Documents**
A complete tender document package can be found at the Notice URL above.

## PROCUREMENT METHOD
Competitive - Open Bidding (cf. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA))
